subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The mercurial Yankees offense at first seemed to be at its slap-hit best but then devolved into its slap-hit worst, as the team fell to the Royals for a second straight night.
snippet: The mercurial Yankees offense at first seemed to be at its slap-hit best but then devolved into its slap-hit worst, as the team fell to the Royals for a second straight night.
